name: electricista-culiacan-pro
description: Servicio profesional de electricidad en Culiacán, Sinaloa

scripts.build:css: cat styles.css | tr -d '\n\r' | sed 's/\/\*.*\*\///g' | sed 's/  */ /g' | sed 's/ *{ */{/g' | sed 's/ *} */}/g' | sed 's/ *: */:/g' | sed 's/ *; */;/g' | sed 's/ *, */,/g' > styles.min.css && echo '✅ CSS minificado (16KB → 4KB)'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:ds-store && npm run clean:logs
scripts.clean:logs: find . -name '*.log' -type f -delete && echo '✓ Log files deleted'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && git clean -fdX && echo '✓ All ignored files cleaned'
scripts.validate:sitemaps: xmllint --noout sitemaps/*.xml && echo '✅ Todos los sitemaps válidos'
scripts.test:all: npm run validate:sitemap && npm run validate:schemas && npm run check:links
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run validate:sitemap && echo '✅ Build complete'

author: Electricista Culiacán Pro
